title: Missing loot
body: when I log on League it told me that I can claim an honor loot box thing but when I go to my loot section, there aren't any honor loot boxes.   I want to know if this only happened to me.

replies.body: Those Honor ward skins were automatically added to your collection! You should be able to see it in your list of ward skins if you hop in a custom game really quickly ^_^
Oh, and yes I did press the claim button.
